text: Ara tamra ka'omera lokera sbatahsphurtabhabe tara (grha) pane chute asate lagala. Purba theke'i tara ku-karme tatpara chila. Luta (ah) balalena-he amara ka'oma, e amara kan'yara rayeche, era tomadera jan'ya adhika pabitratama. Sutaram tomara allahake bhaya kara ebam atithidera byapare amake lajjita karo na, tomadera madhye ki kona bhala manusa ne'i.
